title: Is George Floyd's challenge real?
subtitle: "A troubling challenge" shows most white youth kneeling on each other's necks that seem to simulate George Floyd's death.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Using labels like George Floyd Chaling, whites are engaged in a massive effort to put pictures of themselves kneeling on each other's necks to imitate or mock the death of George Floyd, a black man who died after a police officer kneeled on his neck.
